name: stumbleupon
data_intro: Build a classifier to categorize webpages as evergreen or non-evergreen.Many people know evergreen content when they see it, but can an algorithm make the same determination without human intuition? Your mission is to build a classifier which will evaluate a large set of URLs and label them as either evergreen or ephemeral. Can you out-class(ify) StumbleUpon?

cat_feature_intro.url: Url of the webpage to be classified
cat_feature_intro.urlid: StumbleUpon's unique identifier for each url
cat_feature_intro.framebased: A page is frame-based (1) if it has no body markup but have a frameset markup
cat_feature_intro.hasDomainLink: True (1) if it contains an <a> with an url with domain
cat_feature_intro.is_news: True (1) if StumbleUpon's news classifier determines that this webpage is news
cat_feature_intro.lengthyLinkDomain: True (1) if at least 3 <a> 's text contains more than 30 alphanumeric characters
cat_feature_intro.news_front_page: True (1) if StumbleUpon's news classifier determines that this webpage is front-page news
cat_feature_intro.label: (target) evergreen (1) or non-evergreen (0)

num_feature_intro.avglinksize: Average number of words in each link
num_feature_intro.commonlinkratio_1: Number of links sharing at least 1 word with 1 other links / number of links
num_feature_intro.commonlinkratio_2: Number of links sharing at least 1 word with 2 other links / number of links
num_feature_intro.commonlinkratio_3: Number of links sharing at least 1 word with 3 other links / number of links
num_feature_intro.commonlinkratio_4: Number of links sharing at least 1 word with 4 other links / number of links
num_feature_intro.compression_ratio: Compression achieved on this page via gzip (measure of redundancy)
num_feature_intro.frameTagRatio: Ratio of iframe markups over total number of markups
num_feature_intro.html_ratio: Ratio of tags vs text in the page
num_feature_intro.image_ratio: Ratio of tags vs text in the page
num_feature_intro.linkwordscore: Percentage of words on the page that are in hyperlink's text
num_feature_intro.non_markup_alphanum_characters: Number of alphanumeric characters outside HTML tags
num_feature_intro.parametrizedLinkRatio: A link is parametrized if it's url contains parameters or has an attached onClick event
num_feature_intro.spelling_errors_ratio: Ratio of words not found in wiki (considered to be a spelling mistake)

evaluation_metric: Area Under Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve
